about_the_game:
Eclipse: Shine of Dawn is a game with a Fantasy RPG aesthetic that combines the best of storytelling and hack 'n slash elements, unique characters, memorable enemies, and immersive puzzles in a pleasant setting, whether to think, admire, or beat down hordes of monsters. As you progress through the story, unlock new weapons, abilities, and emotions that deliver unique moments in a completely epic way.




- Original world-building with its own mythologies, regions, and creatures;
- Combo system with alternating between different weapons;
- Weapon evolution through mission-based system;
- Expandable universe.




Follow Luke on his journey of power rise to fulfill his mission. Faced with the kidnapping of Prince Nylo, Luke finds himself in an inevitable situation of seeking to enhance his abilities to the maximum by facing his opponents along the way, so that at his peak, he can confront the imposing being of darkness, The Dark One. Join the hero on this fantastic journey full of mystery, action, and strong emotions. Enhance the legendary sword Suncatcher and the mythical weapons, mastering each of the available abilities to destroy the great evil.




Everyone seeks a higher goal in their journeys, and when two opposing paths cross, confrontation becomes inevitable. However, for every conflict, big or small, the glow of achievement ignites. Among conflicts, bonds are formed, perspectives change, and the flames that burned intensely can illuminate a new vision of each own journey.




Learn how the synergy of legendary weapons works within the Eclipse Universe. Understand how their primordial elements interact and generate fantastic effects. Make combinations your most powerful weapon and be enchanted by so many possibilities.

short_description: The true darkness approaches Absalom, and through the hands of Luke, you will wield the true power capable of cutting it at its roots while seeking to rescue Prince Nylo. Evolve the power of the Suncatcher sword and legendary weapons to face hordes of creatures, iconic puzzles, and bosses.
